title: Tryhards
body: Dear riot, i got so **** bored of **** tryhards in each **** game, game is supposed to be fun playing, but i am not having any fun anymore in a normal game, enemy team taking it so seriously and tryharding as **** all the time and my team is trash, or failers, or leavers, i got sick of that ok ? maybe i am unlucky i dont know, but do smthing ok ? i can have fun only with friends invited, but still enemies just tryhard, normal games are not fun, do smthing riot

replies.body:
{{champion:37}} jungle
{{champion:38}} support (with {{item:2049}} )
{{champion:6}} top
{{champion:45}} ADC (with AD builds)
{{champion:72}} mid

Do this then, 10 games in a row, since you hate it when people do "tryhards", why not you play games with this non-serious team set? If you're not going to do it, that means you're just shietting on whatever you said on this thread.
To me normals is just practice for ranked. (Teambuilder or draft either or) I only go into blind normals for trolly stuff

People play to win. Maybe they think the champs they playing are fun? I have a lot of fun playing akali, yi, zed, fizz, and all adc. Just because you not having fun it does not mean it not  fun for others.
games are supposed to be fun for all players

So what for me and you to have fun in 1 game I have to play boring no cool outplay garbage champs like sona and kayle. You have fun with champs you like to play and I have fun playing akali zed and yi. Who's you to decide what champ is fun and not fun.

in normal everybody tryhards even a little but whats really a piece of shit are these guys who win her lane and then towerdive for a kill all time or waiting in the bush to kill you just because they win the lane and sorry if i hurt now some feelings but most time with champs like Fiora, Akali, Zed or something its okay to tryhard but then pls really tryhard try to push the lane and win the game and dont play games just to fuck up normals ... in normals you play games to chill a little of course you want to win and you play no troll but in normals nobody want to think about ... hmm which lane should i gank ? oh yeah fiora couse she is easy to gank in normals its like your in a elevator and listen to the backgroundmusic to kill your time. 

But these guys who play Akali and then just "roam" what means to sit in the bush all time and waiting for you to farm so she can kill you. If they play like that you can win if you play passiv and farm and get your gold for items but ... i think that it really sucks if you have to play like that.  And its kind of shit that there are champs which nobody plays because they get destroyed in normals like nunu or some other champs. I liked eve pretty much but i cant play her in normals because she ist to weak to go top with her and the new jungle just smash her. 


If its possible it would be awesome if there would be a mode where you cant play metachamps or just these assasins / burster. Only "Oldtimers". That would be really interesting. :3
Very difficult for both teams to have fun when there's a clear winner and loser.

Or you can remember that what you deem as fun isn't what others deem as fun. Some might think that completely and utterly dominating an opponent is fun. Or that seeing a victory screen is fun. Those people will do, and are allowed to do, whatever they have to in order to have their fun as well. Up to and including "try hard"ing.
This game has a strong meta focus as I recall, as such you will find so many try hards.
